sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import "./ExpenseItem.css" const ExpenseItem = (props) => { let month = props.date.toLocaleString("en-US",{month:"long"}) let day = props.date.toLocaleString("en-IN",{day:"2-digit"}) let year = props.date.getFull return ( <>
{day}
{month}
{year}

{props.title}

${props.amount}
) } export default ExpenseItem
